author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Palladam police arrested Suresh for allegedly assaulting a police constable at Palladam during the early hours of Wednesday.

M. Venkatesh (28), the constable attached to Armed Reserve battalion in Coimbatore, was hospitalised with head injuries. Police sources said the incident occurred when the constable asked Suresh to move away from near the police vehicle as the accused was standing in front of the vehicle. The accused immediately assaulted the constable in anger.
title: Youth arrested for assaulting constable
